text: Ordered through Grab Hazelnut Coffee. Seems like the staff blended plastic into my drink!!! No respond from Grab!! Initially thought it’s coconut flakes. But it’s not! Its hard plastic blended! I can’t imagine how many plastic pieces Ive consumed!!
Good snacks just right at the entrance of bugis street. The staff is kind. Serving time is a bit long, perhaps because there are a lot of customers. The place is small
Loved the spicy chicken burger.. one of the best burgers in singapore.. mist visit when in sg .. the staff was very kind and patient..
Nice tasting Gula Melaka-Coffee. Haven’t tried the food.

Bad attitude from the short hair girl that is wearing glasses. Giving eye rolls to customers when she can’t even hear her own customers! Will not recommend! So rude! I literally repeated my self three times . I even use my hand gestures to get her easier to understand . But unfortunately she doesn’t lol. Then she gets frustrated and she gave me an eye roll and a huge sigh . After that she called her boss or brother maybe to come listen to what I’m saying. But the way she speaks is like I owe her money. If I didn’t pay for your food yet, I might as well don’t want it already! And your food isn’t even that good to start off with lol. Do I owe anything?
